quote: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Just as a candle cannot burn without fire, men cannot live without a spiritual life.
name: Buddha

quote: Wise men speak because they have something to say; Fools because they have to say something.
name: Plato

quote: It is easier to build strong children than to repair broken men.
name: Frederick Douglass

quote: No struggle can ever succeed without women participating side by side with men.
name: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quote: Men always want to be a woman's first love - women like to be a man's last romance.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
name: Edmund Burke

quote: It was pride that changed angels into devils; it is humility that makes men as angels.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: Wisdom, compassion, and courage are the three universally recognized moral qualities of men.
name: Confucius

quote: Many men go fishing all of their lives without knowing that it is not fish they are after.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Shallow men believe in luck. Strong men believe in cause and effect.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: If men were angels, no government would be necessary.
name: James Madison

quote: Brave men rejoice in adversity, just as brave soldiers triumph in war.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Great things are done when men and mountains meet.
name: William Blake

quote: Adversity causes some men to break; others to break records.
name: William Arthur Ward

quote: Within the covers of the Bible are the answers for all the problems men face.
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: A gentleman is simply a patient wolf.
name: Lana Turner

quote: Thank God men cannot fly, and lay waste the sky as well as the earth.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: It is foolish and wrong to mourn the men who died. Rather we should thank God that such men lived.
name: George S. Patton

quote: There's three things men always talk about - women, sports, and cars.
name: Mario Lopez

quote: Reputation is what men and women think of us; character is what God and angels know of us.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea.
name: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: Our scientific power has outrun our spiritual power. We have guided missiles and misguided men.
name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Let me embrace thee, sour adversity, for wise men say it is the wisest course.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Victory usually goes to the army who has better trained officers and men.
name: Sun Tzu

quote: It takes a hero to be one of those men who goes into battle.
name: Norman Schwarzkopf

quote: Democracy is when the indigent, and not the men of property, are the rulers.
name: Aristotle

quote: I think women are foolish to pretend they are equal to men; they are far superior and always have been.
name: William Golding

quote: Men and women must be educated, in a great degree, by the opinions and manners of the society they live in.
name: Mary Wollstonecraft

quote: Real men laugh at opposition; real men smile when enemies appear.
name: Marcus Garvey

quote: Men are what their mothers made them.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Older men declare war. But it is the youth that must fight and die.
name: Herbert Hoover

quote: Men have become the tools of their tools.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Video games are a waste of time for men with nothing else to do. Real brains don't do that.
name: Ray Bradbury

quote: Men, their rights, and nothing more; women, their rights, and nothing less.
name: Susan B. Anthony

quote: We hold these truths to be self-evident: that all men and women are created equal.
name: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quote: Great men are like eagles, and build their nest on some lofty solitude.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: The greatest deception men suffer is from their own opinions.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: The truth is not for all men, but only for those who seek it.
name: Ayn Rand

quote: The best teamwork comes from men who are working independently toward one goal in unison.
name: James Cash Penney

quote: The truth is that all men having power ought to be mistrusted.
name: James Madison

quote: Timid men prefer the calm of despotism to the tempestuous sea of liberty.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Yes, guns are to men what jewelry is to women!
name: Steve King

quote: The real problem is not whether machines think but whether men do.
name: B. F. Skinner

quote: The danger of the past was that men became slaves. The danger of the future is that men may become robots.
name: Erich Fromm

quote: When the sword is once drawn, the passions of men observe no bounds of moderation.
name: Alexander Hamilton

quote: Men are born ignorant, not stupid. They are made stupid by education.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: Some men see things as they are, and ask why. I dream of things that never were, and ask why not.
name: Robert Kennedy

quote: Only the wisest and stupidest of men never change.
name: Confucius

quote: No man has any natural authority over his fellow men.
name: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: There are only two forces that unite men - fear and interest.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: I do not think you can name many great inventions that have been made by married men.
name: Nikola Tesla

quote: All men's miseries derive from not being able to sit in a quiet room alone.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: Watches are the only jewelry men can wear, unless you're Mr. T.
name: Gordon Bethune

quote: Rules are for the obedience of fools and the guidance of wise men.
name: Harry Day

quote: Kings may be judges of the earth, but wise men are the judges of kings.
name: Solomon Ibn Gabirol

quote: A lawyer with his briefcase can steal more than a hundred men with guns.
name: Mario Puzo

quote: Civilization is a method of living, an attitude of equal respect for all men.
name: Jane Addams

quote: Without feelings of respect, what is there to distinguish men from beasts?
name: Confucius

quote: As I grow older, I pay less attention to what men say. I just watch what they do.
name: Andrew Carnegie

quote: I have always thought the actions of men the best interpreters of their thoughts.
name: John Locke

quote: Men can only be happy when they do not assume that the object of life is happiness.
name: George Orwell

quote: Wise men don't need advice. Fools won't take it.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Beware, so long as you live, of judging men by their outward appearance.
name: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: Nothing in the affairs of men is worthy of great anxiety.
name: Plato

quote: They talk like angels but they live like men.
name: St. Jerome

quote: Men are moved by two levers only: fear and self interest.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: The actions of men are the best interpreters of their thoughts.
name: James Joyce

quote: All men are equal before fish.
name: Herbert Hoover

quote: Fire is the test of gold; adversity, of strong men.
name: Martha Graham

quote: Rhetoric is the art of ruling the minds of men.
name: Plato

quote: The men who learn endurance, are they who call the whole world, brother.
name: Charles Dickens

quote: Few men have virtue to withstand the highest bidder.
name: George Washington

quote: The less men think, the more they talk.
name: Montesquieu

quote: Live as brave men; and if fortune is adverse, front its blows with brave hearts.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Conservation is a state of harmony between men and land.
name: Aldo Leopold

quote: Great hopes make great men.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: Two men look out the same prison bars; one sees mud and the other stars.
name: Beck

quote: Men are not prisoners of fate, but only prisoners of their own minds.
name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: If any civilization is to survive, it is the morality of altruism that men have to reject.
name: Ayn Rand

quote: The army teaches boys to think like men.
name: Elvis Presley

quote: Men are more moral than they think and far more immoral than they can imagine.
name: Sigmund Freud

quote: The man who trusts men will make fewer mistakes than he who distrusts them.
name: Camillo di Cavour

quote: All men's souls are immortal, but the souls of the righteous are immortal and divine.
name: Socrates

quote: I do not wish women to have power over men; but over themselves.
name: Mary Shelley

quote: I dress for the image. Not for myself, not for the public, not for fashion, not for men.
name: Marlene Dietrich

quote: More men die of jealousy than of cancer.
name: Joseph P. Kennedy

quote: Passion makes idiots of the cleverest men, and makes the biggest idiots clever.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: As men get older, the toys get more expensive.
name: Marvin Davis

quote: To attract men, I wear a perfume called 'New Car Interior.'
name: Rita Rudner

quote: Men who are in earnest are not afraid of consequences.
name: Marcus Garvey

quote: Men stumble over pebbles, never over mountains.
name: Marilyn French

quote: Men are like steel. When they lose their temper, they lose their worth.
name: Chuck Norris

quote: Death is not the worst that can happen to men.
name: Plato

quote: Monkeys are superior to men in this: when a monkey looks into a mirror, he sees a monkey.
name: Malcolm de Chazal

quote: No great man lives in vain. The history of the world is but the biography of great men.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Men are like wine - some turn to vinegar, but the best improve with age.
name: Pope John XXIII

quote: The evil that men do lives after them; the good is oft interred with their bones.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: The worst thing about some men is that when they are not drunk they are sober.
name: William Butler Yeats

quote: I am not a hero but the brave men who died deserved this honor.
name: Ira Hayes

quote: Liberate the minds of men and ultimately you will liberate the bodies of men.
name: Marcus Garvey

quote: To sin by silence, when we should protest, Makes cowards out of men.
name: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quote: Let men see, let them know, a real man, who lives as he was meant to live.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The first method for estimating the intelligence of a ruler is to look at the men he has around him.
name: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: Men may die, but the fabrics of free institutions remains unshaken.
name: Chester A. Arthur

quote: Only free men can negotiate. A prisoner cannot enter into contracts.
name: Nelson Mandela

quote: Kids, adults, men, women, everybody has a relationship with Mickey Mouse.
name: Warren Spector

quote: Deprived of meaningful work, men and women lose their reason for existence; they go stark, raving mad.
name: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: The better I get to know men, the more I find myself loving dogs.
name: Charles de Gaulle

quote: Men and women are like right and left hands; it doesn't make sense not to use both.
name: Jeannette Rankin

quote: Strong men have sound ideas and the force to make these ideas effective.
name: Andrew Mellon

quote: The truth is that men are tired of liberty.
name: Benito Mussolini

quote: Here men from the planet Earth first set foot upon the Moon. July 1969 AD. We came in peace for all mankind.
name: Neil Armstrong

quote: Some men do think I'm a psycho bunny-boiler.
name: Amy Winehouse

quote: Manhood coerced into sensitivity is no manhood at all.
name: Camille Paglia

quote: Being a woman is a terribly difficult task, since it consists principally in dealing with men.
name: Joseph Conrad

quote: On this shrunken globe, men can no longer live as strangers.
name: Adlai Stevenson I

quote: I speak Spanish to God, Italian to women, French to men, and German to my horse.
name: Charles V

quote: Envy blinds men and makes it impossible for them to think clearly.
name: Malcolm X

quote: Every man is born as many men and dies as a single one.
name: Martin Heidegger

quote: The practice of charity will bind us - will bind all men in one great brotherhood.
name: Conrad Hilton

quote: As a rule, men worry more about what they can't see than about what they can.
name: Julius Caesar

quote: One machine can do the work of fifty ordinary men. No machine can do the work of one extraordinary man.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Perfect numbers like perfect men are very rare.
name: Rene Descartes

quote: Ten men waiting for me at the door? Send one of them home, I'm tired.
name: Mae West

quote: When good people in any country cease their vigilance and struggle, then evil men prevail.
name: Pearl S. Buck

quote: Do not put such unlimited power into the hands of husbands. Remember all men would be tyrants if they could.
name: Abigail Adams

quote: The time is near at hand which must determine whether Americans are to be free men or slaves.
name: George Washington

quote: Leadership consists of picking good men and helping them do their best.
name: Chester W. Nimitz

quote: You can't keep changing men, so you settle for changing your lipstick.
name: Heather Locklear

quote: Great men are seldom over-scrupulous in the arrangement of their attire.
name: Charles Dickens

quote: It is a melancholy truth that even great men have their poor relations.
name: Charles Dickens

quote: Most men pursue pleasure with such breathless haste that they hurry past it.
name: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: I know and do what is right better than many big men who read.
name: Sojourner Truth

quote: Those who expect to reap the blessings of freedom must, like men, undergo the fatigue of supporting it.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: There is frequently more to be learned from the unexpected questions of a child than the discourses of men.
name: John Locke

quote: Not to engage in the pursuit of ideas is to live like ants instead of like men.
name: Mortimer Adler

quote: Wise men argue causes; fools decide them.
name: Anacharsis

quote: Men are like the stars; some generate their own light while others reflect the brilliance they receive.
name: Jose Marti

quote: As long as you know men are like children, you know everything!
name: Coco Chanel

quote: There are many men of principle in both parties in America, but there is no party of principle.
name: Alexis de Tocqueville

quote: You may depend upon it that they are as good hearts to serve men in palaces as in cottages.
name: Robert Owen

quote: If you ask, do you like strong men or weak men, I'd say, I like who I like.
name: Miuccia Prada

quote: It is not titles that honor men, but men that honor titles.
name: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: Strong beliefs win strong men, and then make them stronger.
name: Richard Bach

quote: It is our duty as men and women to proceed as though the limits of our abilities do not exist.
name: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: Man becomes great exactly in the degree in which he works for the welfare of his fellow-men.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The mass of men lead lives of quiet desperation. What is called resignation is confirmed desperation.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Bad men are full of repentance.
name: Aristotle

quote: Men must live and create. Live to the point of tears.
name: Albert Camus

quote: Youth cannot know how age thinks and feels. But old men are guilty if they forget what it was to be young.
name: J. K. Rowling

quote: When men and women are able to respect and accept their differences then love has a chance to blossom.
name: John Gray

quote: A government of laws, and not of men.
name: John Adams

quote: Conservation means the wise use of the earth and its resources for the lasting good of men.
name: Gifford Pinchot

quote: I am looking for a lot of men who have an infinite capacity to not know what can't be done.
name: Henry Ford

quote: Produce great men, the rest follows.
name: Walt Whitman

quote: Men of lofty genius when they are doing the least work are most active.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: The truth is found when men are free to pursue it.
name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Men are strong so long as they represent a strong idea they become powerless when they oppose it.
name: Sigmund Freud

quote: All men are by nature born equally free and independent.
name: George Mason

quote: We do not want the men of another color for our brothers-in-law, but we do want them for our brothers.
name: Booker T. Washington

quote: Men can starve from a lack of self-realization as much as they can from a lack of bread.
name: Richard Wright

quote: I never wanted to weigh more heavily on a man than a bird.
name: Coco Chanel

quote: Of all the properties which belong to honorable men, not one is so highly prized as that of character.
name: Henry Clay

quote: By nature, men love newfangledness.
name: Geoffrey Chaucer

quote: The world would be happier if men had the same capacity to be silent that they have to speak.
name: Baruch Spinoza

quote: Good men are the stars, the planets of the ages wherein they live, and illustrate the times.
name: Ben Jonson

quote: Men become wise just as they become rich, more by what they save than by what they receive.
name: Wilbur Wright

quote: Men fail much oftener from want of perseverance than from want of talent.
name: William Cobbett

quote: Oh, we want a new breed of men before India can be cleansed of her disease.
name: Sarojini Naidu

quote: Men who are too good looking are never good in bed because they never had to be.
name: Sarah Jessica Parker

quote: Pride, envy, avarice - these are the sparks have set on fire the hearts of all men.
name: Dante Alighieri

quote: The strength and power of a country depends absolutely on the quantity of good men and women in it.
name: John Ruskin

quote: No man who knows aught, can be so stupid to deny that all men naturally were born free.
name: John Milton

quote: If I have any sexist feelings they are aimed at men: I hate manly men.
name: David Bailey

quote: Men should strive to think much and know little.
name: Democritus

quote: But more wonderful than the lore of old men and the lore of books is the secret lore of ocean.
name: H. P. Lovecraft

quote: I have talked with great men, and I do not see how they differ from others.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Men's vows are women's traitors!
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Women may fall when there's no strength in men.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Truth is the property of no individual but is the treasure of all men.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Men love to wonder, and that is the seed of science.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Adversity makes men, and prosperity makes monsters.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: Men have a respect for scholarship and learning greatly out of proportion to the use they commonly serve.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: There are three classes of men; lovers of wisdom, lovers of honor, and lovers of gain.
name: Plato

quote: Honor is simply the morality of superior men.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: Landlords, like all other men, love to reap where they never sowed.
name: Karl Marx

quote: The main purpose of the stock market is to make fools of as many men as possible.
name: Bernard Baruch

quote: When men yield up the privilege of thinking, the last shadow of liberty quits the horizon.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: The men who have succeeded are men who have chosen one line and stuck to it.
name: Andrew Carnegie

quote: Men never do evil so completely and cheerfully as when they do it from religious conviction.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: To be a man is to suffer for others. God help us to be men!
name: Cesar Chavez

quote: The straight line belongs to men, the curved one to God.
name: Antoni Gaudi

quote: Men are disturbed not by things, but by the view which they take of them.
name: Epictetus

quote: Men take only their needs into consideration - never their abilities.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: We learn from experience that men never learn anything from experience.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Married men live longer than single men. But married men are a lot more willing to die.
name: Johnny Carson

quote: The root of all superstition is that men observe when a thing hits, but not when it misses.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: Time, which alone makes the reputation of men, ends by making their defects respectable.
name: Voltaire

quote: The world is divided into men who have wit and no religion and men who have religion and no wit.
name: Avicenna

quote: The ballot box is the surest arbiter of disputes among free men.
name: James Buchanan

quote: The spirit of liberalism is to create free men; it is not the regimentation of men.
name: Herbert Hoover

quote: All women think men look good in suits. To be honest, I like the way they look, too.
name: Liam Hemsworth

quote: Why should I ask the wise men: Whence is my beginning? I am busy with the thought: Where will be my end?
name: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: Tears are often the telescope by which men see far into heaven.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Men are rather reasoning than reasonable animals, for the most part governed by the impulse of passion.
name: Alexander Hamilton

quote: There should be no boundaries, no hierarchy, no violence. Men and women are equal.
name: Alessandro Michele

quote: Hope is the only good that is common to all men; those who have nothing else possess hope still.
name: Thales

quote: To send light into the darkness of men's hearts - such is the duty of the artist.
name: Robert Schumann

quote: Where wealth accumulates, men decay.
name: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: There is nothing wrong with men possessing riches. The wrong comes when riches possess men.
name: Billy Graham

quote: Treat all men alike. Give them the same law. Give them an even chance to live and grow.
name: Chief Joseph

quote: Equality is like gravity. We need it to stand on this earth as men and women.
name: Joss Whedon

quote: I am an agnostic; I do not pretend to know what many ignorant men are sure of.
name: Clarence Darrow

quote: All great men are gifted with intuition. They know without reasoning or analysis, what they need to know.
name: Alexis Carrel

quote: Circumstances rule men; men do not rule circumstances.
name: Herodotus

quote: Men don't care what's on TV. They only care what else is on TV.
name: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: Men aren't necessities. They're luxuries.
name: Cher

quote: All men were made by the Great Spirit Chief. They are all brothers.
name: Chief Joseph

quote: Men and women should stay apart, till their hearts grow gentle towards one another again.
name: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Men are freest when they are most unconscious of freedom. The shout is a rattling of chains, always was.
name: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Every man is a volume if you know how to read him.
name: William Ellery Channing

quote: Men are like sheep, of which a flock is more easily driven than a single one.
name: Richard Whately

quote: No gentleman ever discusses any relationship with a lady.
name: Keith Miller

quote: Most men, when they think they are thinking, are merely rearranging their prejudices.
name: Knute Rockne

quote: Bachelors have consciences, married men have wives.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: Gold is good in its place; but loving, brave, patriotic men are better than gold.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Force always attracts men of low morality.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: It doesn't take a hero to order men into battle. It takes a hero to be one of those men who goes into battle.
name: Norman Schwarzkopf

quote: Men shut their doors against a setting sun.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Content makes poor men rich; discontent makes rich men poor.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Even the handsomest men do not have the same momentary effect on the world as a truly beautiful woman does.
name: Jonathan Carroll

quote: Men admire the man who can organize their wishes and thoughts in stone and wood and steel and brass.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Great men are they who see that spiritual is stronger than any material force - that thoughts rule the world.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Instead of noblemen, let us have noble villages of men.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I will not be concerned at other men's not knowing me; I will be concerned at my own want of ability.
name: Confucius

quote: Men's ideas are the most direct emanations of their material state.
name: Karl Marx

quote: Men do not shape destiny, Destiny produces the man for the hour.
name: Fidel Castro

quote: Sometimes the first duty of intelligent men is the restatement of the obvious.
name: George Orwell

quote: Power is what men seek and any group that gets it will abuse it.
name: Lincoln Steffens

quote: We cannot live only for ourselves. A thousand fibers connect us with our fellow men.
name: Herman Melville

quote: Men are born to succeed, not to fail.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I heard the old, old, men say 'all that's beautiful drifts away, like the waters.'
name: William Butler Yeats

quote: Regarding life, the wisest men of all ages have judged alike: it is worthless.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: When a hundred men stand together, each of them loses his mind and gets another one.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Men must be governed by God or they will be ruled by tyrants.
name: William Penn

quote: These are the times that try men's souls.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: A little nonsense now and then is relished by the wisest men.
name: Roald Dahl

quote: We have now sunk to a depth at which restatement of the obvious is the first duty of intelligent men.
name: George Orwell

quote: Men are only as good as their technical development allows them to be.
name: George Orwell

quote: Art is the right hand of Nature. The latter has only given us being, the former has made us men.
name: Friedrich Schiller

quote: Do not trust all men, but trust men of worth; the former course is silly, the latter a mark of prudence.
name: Democritus

quote: Only the unknown frightens men. But once a man has faced the unknown, that terror becomes the known.
name: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: Luck is not something you can mention in the presence of self-made men.
name: E. B. White

quote: It is not these well-fed long-haired men that I fear, but the pale and the hungry-looking.
name: Julius Caesar

quote: Choose silence of all virtues, for by it you hear other men's imperfections, and conceal your own.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Long before history began we men have got together apart from the women and done things. We had time.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: The rules of wildlife are simple and clear, which is not the case for men.
name: Laurent Baheux

quote: Let your Discourse with Men of Business be Short and Comprehensive.
name: George Washington

quote: Brave men are all vertebrates; they have their softness on the surface and their toughness in the middle.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Whatever deceives men seems to produce a magical enchantment.
name: Plato

quote: It is in the character of very few men to honor without envy a friend who has prospered.
name: Aeschylus

quote: Men are more easily governed through their vices than through their virtues.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: It is only when men begin to worship that they begin to grow.
name: Calvin Coolidge

quote: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: All men make mistakes, but married men find out about them sooner.
name: Red Skelton

quote: At Athens, wise men propose, and fools dispose.
name: Alcuin

quote: The people respect and believe in men who fulfill their duty.
name: Fidel Castro

quote: The same way that racism is a white person's problem, violence against women is a men's problem.
name: Gloria Steinem

quote: Ignorant men raise questions that wise men answered a thousand years ago.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: It is not women's liberation, it is women's and men's liberation.
name: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quote: For many men, the acquisition of wealth does not end their troubles, it only changes them.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: The story of the human race is the story of men and women selling themselves short.
name: Abraham Maslow

quote: One man that has a mind and knows it can always beat ten men who haven't and don't.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The graveyards are full of indispensable men.
name: Charles de Gaulle

quote: Labor disgraces no man; unfortunately, you occasionally find men who disgrace labor.
name: Ulysses S. Grant

quote: The first rule of business is: Do other men for they would do you.
name: Charles Dickens

quote: Culture: the cry of men in face of their destiny.
name: Albert Camus

quote: Giving every man a vote has no more made men wise and free than Christianity has made them good.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: What men value in this world is not rights but privileges.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: We should weep for men at their birth, not at their death.
name: Montesquieu

quote: Of all men's miseries the bitterest is this: to know so much and to have control over nothing.
name: Herodotus

quote: Money demands that you sell, not your weakness to men's stupidity, but your talent to their reason.
name: Ayn Rand

quote: The history of free men is never really written by chance but by choice; their choice!
name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: The advice of the elders to young men is very apt to be as unreal as a list of the hundred best books.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: Men get to be a mixture of the charming mannerisms of the women they have known.
name: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Smart women love smart men more than smart men love smart women.
name: Natalie Portman

quote: Bacchus hath drowned more men than Neptune.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: There is no such thing as justice in the abstract; it is merely a compact between men.
name: Epicurus

quote: Men trust their ears less than their eyes.
name: Herodotus

quote: Big dreams create the magic that stir men's souls to greatness.
name: Bill McCartney

quote: If all men knew what others say of them, there would not be four friends in the world.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: Men do not quit playing because they grow old; they grow old because they quit playing.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: More men fail through lack of purpose than lack of talent.
name: Billy Sunday

quote: Men! The only animal in the world to fear.
name: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Men are the dreams of a shadow.
name: Pindar

quote: I only have 'yes' men around me. Who needs 'no' men?
name: Mae West

quote: The most positive men are the most credulous.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: I consider wisdom supernatural because it isn't taught by men - it's a gift from God.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: Being beautiful is not so fun when you're in a business with all men.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: Women have a favorite room, men a favorite chair.
name: Bernard Williams

quote: Many men owe the grandeur of their lives to their tremendous difficulties.
name: Charles Spurgeon

quote: Men are governed by lines of intellect - women: by curves of emotion.
name: James Joyce

quote: Men must know their limitations.
name: Clint Eastwood

quote: Neutral men are the devil's allies.
name: Edwin Hubbel Chapin

quote: The brave men who died in Vietnam, more than 100% of which were black, were the ultimate sacrifice.
name: Marion Barry

quote: I only like two kinds of men, domestic and imported.
name: Mae West

quote: Men must be taught as if you taught them not, and things unknown proposed as things forgot.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: Men shrink less from offending one who inspires love than one who inspires fear.
name: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: Once men are caught up in an event, they cease to be afraid. Only the unknown frightens men.
name: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: Religion fails if it cannot speak to men as they are.
name: William Barclay

quote: I think one of the basic reasons men make good friends is that they can make up their minds quickly.
name: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Love lights more fires than hate extinguishes, and men grow better as the world grows old.
name: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quote: Young men have a passion for regarding their elders as senile.
name: Henry Adams

quote: Boys will be boys, and so will a lot of middle-aged men.
name: Kin Hubbard

quote: My mom said the only reason men are alive is for lawn care and vehicle maintenance.
name: Tim Allen

quote: Nothing doth more hurt in a state than that cunning men pass for wise.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: First find the man in yourself if you will inspire manliness in others.
name: Amos Bronson Alcott

quote: Make no little plans; they have no magic to stir men's blood and probably themselves will not be realized.
name: Daniel Burnham

quote: Men would live exceedingly quiet if these two words, mine and thine, were taken away.
name: Anaxagoras

quote: Most men who have really lived have had, in some share, their great adventure. This railway is mine.
name: James J. Hill

quote: Nothing is as peevish and pedantic as men's judgments of one another.
name: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: Government is an association of men who do violence to the rest of us.
name: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Good and bad men are less than they seem.
name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: What's with you men? Would hair stop growing on your chest if you asked directions somewhere?
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: Most men are within a finger's breadth of being mad.
name: Diogenes

quote: It is the privilege of the gods to want nothing, and of godlike men to want little.
name: Diogenes

quote: Women lie about their age; men lie about their income.
name: William Feather

quote: I usually make up my mind about a man in ten seconds, and I very rarely change it.
name: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Time destroys the speculation of men, but it confirms nature.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: My drawing for women is really curvy. My drawings for men are actually quite angular.
name: Christian Louboutin

quote: When men and women agree, it is only in their conclusions; their reasons are always different.
name: George Santayana

quote: As soon as laws are necessary for men, they are no longer fit for freedom.
name: Pythagoras

quote: There would be no great men if there were no little ones.
name: George Herbert

quote: There are no hopeless situations; there are only men who have grown hopeless about them.
name: Clare Boothe Luce

quote: When Jesus comes back, these crazy, greedy, capitalistic men are gonna kill him again.
name: Mike Tyson

quote: We are men of action, lies do not become us.
name: William Goldman

quote: There's a lot of females that hustle, just like men hustle.
name: Fetty Wap

quote: Why is it that, as a culture, we are more comfortable seeing two men holding guns than holding hands?
name: Ernest Gaines

quote: To speak as the common people do, to think as wise men do is style.
name: Roger Ascham

quote: Strong women only marry weak men.
name: Bette Davis

quote: Men should think twice before making widow hood woman's only path to power.
name: Gloria Steinem

quote: Men are born with two eyes, but with one tongue, in order that they should see twice as much as they say.
name: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: If the world were a logical place, men would ride side saddle.
name: Rita Mae Brown

quote: To the extent that laws are founded on morality and on logic, they can lead men's hearts and minds.
name: Robert Kennedy

quote: Whatever makes men good Christians, makes them good citizens.
name: Daniel Webster

quote: I met a hundred men going to Delhi, and every one is my brother.
name: Pope Paul VI

quote: By indignities men come to dignities.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: Deliberation is the work of many men. Action, of one alone.
name: Charles de Gaulle

quote: Those men get along best with women who can get along best without them.
name: Charles Baudelaire

quote: Men die in despair, while spirits die in ecstasy.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: Gladly we desire to make other men perfect, but we will not amend our own fault.
name: Thomas a Kempis

quote: Grown men do not need leaders.
name: Edward Abbey

quote: Women cannot complain about men anymore until they start getting better taste in them.
name: Bill Maher

quote: God appoints our graces to be nurses to other men's weaknesses.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: When Harvard men say they have graduated from Radcliffe, then we've made it.
name: Jackie Kennedy

quote: When all men think alike, no one thinks very much.
name: Walter Lippmann

quote: The rich man who gives, steals twice over. First he steals the money and then the hearts of men.
name: Edvard Munch

quote: Men tire themselves in pursuit of rest.
name: Laurence Sterne

quote: I'm not denyin' the women are foolish. God Almighty made 'em to match the men.
name: George Eliot

quote: If men knew all that women think, they would be twenty times more audacious.
name: Alphonse Karr

quote: Men do not fail; they give up trying.
name: Elihu Root

quote: Men often act knowingly against their interest.
name: David Hume

quote: The public weal requires that men should betray, and lie, and massacre.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: All men who have turned out worth anything have had the chief hand in their own education.
name: Walter Scott

quote: Men, who are rogues individually, are in the mass very honorable people.
name: Montesquieu

quote: Women prefer to talk in twos, while men prefer to talk in threes.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Every man needs two women: a quiet home-maker, and a thrilling nymph.
name: Iris Murdoch

quote: A woman simply is, but a man must become.
name: Camille Paglia

quote: The thickness of the walls should be sufficient for two armed men to pass each other with ease.
name: Vitruvius

quote: Men should never marry their muse. It ruins the illusion.
name: Stana Katic

quote: Anytime you get men in glitter, it's a flamboyant occasion!
name: Johnny Weir

quote: A bachelor is a guy who never made the same mistake once.
name: Phyllis Diller

quote: Men are not punished for their sins, but by them.
name: Kin Hubbard

quote: Seriously, in America there are more big, curvy girls than there are little girls, and men love us, too.
name: Jill Scott

quote: There is always a type of man who says he loves his fellow men, and expects to make a living at it.
name: E. W. Howe

quote: Men give away nothing so liberally as their advice.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Men, as well as women, are much oftener led by their hearts than by their understandings.
name: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quote: No nice men are good at getting taxis.
name: Katharine Whitehorn

quote: For tis not in mere death that men die most.
name: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: Men's arguments often prove nothing but their wishes.
name: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: Men won't read any email from a woman that's over 200 words long.
name: Douglas Coupland

quote: Where all men think alike, no one thinks very much.
name: Walter Lippmann

quote: Human misery is too great for men to do without faith.
name: Heinrich Heine

quote: Women thrive on novelty and are easy meat for the commerce of fashion. Men prefer old pipes and torn jackets.
name: Anthony Burgess

quote: When two men in business always agree, one of them is unnecessary.
name: Ezra Pound

quote: Men have as exaggerated an idea of their rights as women have of their wrongs.
name: E. W. Howe

quote: One must judge men not by their opinions, but by what their opinions have made of them.
name: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quote: Men tend to feel threatened; women tend to feel guilty.
name: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: Culture makes all men gentle.
name: Menander

quote: All men have an instinct for conflict: at least, all healthy men.
name: Hilaire Belloc

quote: He was one of those men who possess almost every gift, except the gift of the power to use them.
name: Charles Kingsley

quote: Men may live fools, but fools they cannot die.
name: Edward Young

quote: Men, even when alone, lighten their labors by song, however rude it may be.
name: Quintilian

quote: Whenever ideas fail, men invent words.
name: Martin H. Fischer

quote: It's at the borders of pain and suffering that the men are separated from the boys.
name: Emil Zatopek

quote: Men are not against you; they are merely for themselves.
name: Gene Fowler

quote: Stronger by weakness, wiser men become.
name: Edmund Waller

quote: The beauty of a strong, lasting commitment is often best understood by men incapable of it.
name: Murray Kempton

quote: The true index of a man's character is the health of his wife.
name: Cyril Connolly

quote: Law describes the way things would work if men were angels.
name: Christopher Dawson

quote: For most men life is a search for the proper manila envelope in which to get themselves filed.
name: Clifton Fadiman

quote: Either men will learn to live like brothers, or they will die like beasts.
name: Max Lerner

quote: Italian men do appreciate beautiful women. They're not afraid of the beauty, which is nice.
name: Eva Herzigova

quote: Men are different. When they are in love they may also have other girlfriends.
name: Zhang Ziyi

quote: Like all young men I set out to be a genius, but mercifully laughter intervened.
name: Lawrence Durrell

quote: Men are often biased in their judgment on account of their sympathy and their interests.
name: George William Norris

quote: As I said, men value their independence in a weird way, above practically everything.
name: George Weinberg

quote: Men are actually the weaker sex.
name: George Weinberg

quote: When a man is no longer anxious to do better than well, he is done for.
name: Benjamin Haydon
